LanguageData.CookMealSimple.label: cook simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient.
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleCampfire.label: cook simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleCampfire.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient.
LanguageData.CookMealFine.label: cook fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.label: cook lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.CookMealSimple_Bulk.label: cook four simple meals
LanguageData.CookMealSimple_Bulk.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient. Makes enough for 4 meals.
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Bulk.label: cook four fine meals
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Bulk.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Makes enough for 4 meals.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Bulk.label: cook four lavish meals
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Bulk.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted. Makes enough for 4 meals.
LanguageData.Stirfrymeal.label: cook four stir-fried meals
LanguageData.Stirfrymeal.description:
Cooks a stir-fried meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. 

Makes enough for 4 meals. 

Food Effects: Manipulation and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.Cookstewpot.label: cook eight pots of stew
LanguageData.Cookstewpot.description:
Slow cooks a pot of stew from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. 

Makes enough for 8 meals. 

Food Effects: Consciousness, Metabolism, Blood Filtration, and Blood Pumping.
LanguageData.CookGrillcheese.label: cook two grilled cheeses
LanguageData.CookGrillcheese.description:
Two slices of bread grilled with cheese melt in the middle. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.GrillPolenta.label: grill two polenta
LanguageData.GrillPolenta.description:
Grilled slices of Polenta. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.Cookgrilledsandwich.label: cook two cheeseburgers
LanguageData.Cookgrilledsandwich.description:
Two slices of bread with grilled meat and cheese melt. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.CookTacos.label: cook five tacos
LanguageData.CookTacos.description:
Meat and Cheese in a Corn shell. 

 Makes 5 servings. 

Food Effects: Manipulation and Metabolism.
LanguageData.CookPorridge.label: cook two porridges
LanguageData.CookPorridge.description:
A simple porridge cooked from grains. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Sight and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.VG_MakebulkKibble.label: make bulk kibble
LanguageData.VG_MakebulkKibble.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants.
LanguageData.VG_MakebulkPemmican.label: make bulk pemmican
LanguageData.VG_MakebulkPemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
